Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Texas in 1968...
Traded from Texas to Houston on 3/2/1968 (Going to TEX: C D. Pick. Going to HOU: 2B J. Orta)...
Injured on 4/4/1968 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/12/1968 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/21/1973 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/30/1976 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 8/7/1978 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1979, off Dennis Daboll (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/17/1979, off Mark Fidrych (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1979, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1979, hitting .474 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1980, hitting .391 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
